languages.text: "Запрашиваю разрешение на спасение ценных технологий из этого чрева энтропии и рассадника нарушений норм хранения".

traits.locale_text: "Запрашиваю разрешение на спасение ценных технологий из этого чрева энтропии и рассадника нарушений норм хранения".

languages.text: "Requesting permission to rescue valuable technology from this maw of entropy and cesspool of violated storage regulations."
languages.original_text: "Запрашиваю разрешение на спасение ценных технологий из этого чрева энтропии и рассадника нарушений норм хранения".

traits.locale_text: "Requesting permission to rescue valuable technology from this maw of entropy and cesspool of violated storage regulations."
"Requesting permission to rescue valuable technology from this maw of entropy and cesspool of violated storage regulations."
"Requesting permission to rescue valuable technology from this maw of entropy and cesspool of violated storage regulations."

"Requesting permission to rescue valuable technology from this maw of entropy and cesspool of violated storage regulations."
"Requesting permission to rescue valuable technology from this maw of entropy and cesspool of violated storage regulations."

languages.text: 「この崩壊の渦と保管規定違反の泥沼から、貴重な技術を救出する許可を申請する」
languages.original_text: "Requesting permission to rescue valuable technology from this maw of entropy and cesspool of violated storage regulations."

traits.locale_text: 「この崩壊の渦と保管規定違反の泥沼から、貴重な技術を救出する許可を申請する」

languages.text: "Erbitte Erlaubnis zur Rettung wertvoller Technologie aus diesem Schlund der Entropie und Pfuhl von Verstößen gegen Lagervorschriften."
languages.original_text: "Requesting permission to rescue valuable technology from this maw of entropy and cesspool of violated storage regulations."

traits.locale_text: "Erbitte Erlaubnis zur Rettung wertvoller Technologie aus diesem Schlund der Entropie und Pfuhl von Verstößen gegen Lagervorschriften."

languages.text: « Je demande la permission de secourir toute technologie de valeur de cet antre d'entropie, ce cloaque de régulations d'entreposage transgressées. »
languages.original_text: "Requesting permission to rescue valuable technology from this maw of entropy and cesspool of violated storage regulations."

traits.locale_text: « Je demande la permission de secourir toute technologie de valeur de cet antre d'entropie, ce cloaque de régulations d'entreposage transgressées. »

languages.text: «Solicito permiso para recuperar valiosas tecnologías de esta fosa séptica de entropía e infracciones de las normativas de almacenamiento».
languages.original_text: "Requesting permission to rescue valuable technology from this maw of entropy and cesspool of violated storage regulations."

traits.locale_text: «Solicito permiso para recuperar valiosas tecnologías de esta fosa séptica de entropía e infracciones de las normativas de almacenamiento».

languages.text: “正在请求许可，要求从这一大堆熵与违反存储规定的泥潭之中抢救有价值的技术设备。”
languages.original_text: "Requesting permission to rescue valuable technology from this maw of entropy and cesspool of violated storage regulations."

traits.locale_text: “正在请求许可，要求从这一大堆熵与违反存储规定的泥潭之中抢救有价值的技术设备。”

languages.text: "Bu kirli entropi yuvasından, ihlal edilmiş depo mevzuatı çöplüğünden değerli teknoloji toplama izni talep ediyorum."
languages.original_text: "Requesting permission to rescue valuable technology from this maw of entropy and cesspool of violated storage regulations."

traits.locale_text: "Bu kirli entropi yuvası, ihlal edilmiş depo mevzuatı çöplüğünden değerli teknoloji toplama izni talep ediyorum."
